flawed_nl_solution:
When he gave 40 seashells to his friends, Ali had 180-40= <<180-40=140>>140 seashells.
When he gave another 30 seashells to his brothers, he had 140-30 = <<140-30=101>>101 seashells
He also sold half of the seashells, a total of 1/2*101 = <<1/2*101=101/2>>101/2 seashells
He was left with 101-101/2= <<101-101/2=101/2>>101/2 seashells
#### 101/2

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 110, not 101. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
